verses.text: And in the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* \w strengthened|strong="H2388"\w* himself, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w*, \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jeroham|strong="H3395"\w*, and \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehohanan|strong="H3076"\w*, and \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Obed|strong="H5744"\w*, and \w Maaseiah|strong="H4641"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Adaiah|strong="H5718"\w*, and \w Elishaphat|strong="H0478"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zichri|strong="H2147"\w*, into \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with him.

And they went \w about|strong="H5437"\w* in \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* out of all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And all the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Behold, the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* shall \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w said|strong="H1696"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

This \add is\add* the \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* that ye shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w*; A third \w part|strong="H7992"\w* of you \w entering|strong="H0935"\w* on the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*, of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \add shall be\add* \w porters|strong="H7778"\w* of the \w doors|strong="H5592"\w*;\f + \fr 23.4 \ft doors: Heb. thresholds\f*

And a third \w part|strong="H7992"\w* \add shall be\add* at the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; and a third \w part|strong="H7992"\w* at the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w foundation|strong="H3247"\w*: and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add shall be\add* in the \w courts|strong="H2691"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

But let none \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, save the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, and they that \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*; they shall go \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, for they \add are\add* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*: but all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w watch|strong="H4931"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* shall \w compass|strong="H5362"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* with his \w weapons|strong="H3627"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*; and whosoever \add else\add* \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, he shall be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*: but be ye with the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* when he cometh \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, and when he goeth \w out|strong="H3318"\w*.

So the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* and all \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* according to all things that \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* had \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that were to come \w in|strong="H0935"\w* on the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*, with them that were to \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \add out\add* on the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*: for \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w dismissed|strong="H6358"\w* not the \w courses|strong="H4256"\w*.

Moreover \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* to the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w* \w spears|strong="H2595"\w*, and \w bucklers|strong="H4043"\w*, and \w shields|strong="H7982"\w*, that \add had been\add* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w*, which \add were\add* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And he \w set|strong="H5975"\w* all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* having his \w weapon|strong="H7973"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, from the \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w side|strong="H3802"\w* of the \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* to the \w left|strong="H8042"\w* \w side|strong="H3802"\w* of the \w temple|strong="H1004"\w*, along by the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* and the \w temple|strong="H1004"\w*, by the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.\f + \fr 23.10 \ft side: Heb. shoulder\f*\f + \fr 23.10 \ft temple: Heb. house\f*

Then they brought \w out|strong="H3318"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* upon him the \w crown|strong="H5145"\w*, and \add gave him\add* the \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w*, and made him \w king|strong="H4427"\w*. And \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* him, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, God \w save|strong="H2421"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.\f + \fr 23.11 \ft God…: Heb. Let the king live\f*

¶ Now when \w Athaliah|strong="H6271"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w running|strong="H7323"\w* and \w praising|strong="H1984"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, she \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*:

And she \w looked|strong="H7200"\w*, and, behold, the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* at his \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* at the entering \w in|strong="H3996"\w*, and the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* and the \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w* by the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w rejoiced|strong="H8056"\w*, and \w sounded|strong="H8628"\w* with \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w*, also the \w singers|strong="H7891"\w* with \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w* of \w musick|strong="H7892"\w*, and such as \w taught|strong="H3045"\w* to sing \w praise|strong="H1984"\w*. Then \w Athaliah|strong="H6271"\w* \w rent|strong="H7167"\w* her \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Treason|strong="H7195"\w*, \w Treason|strong="H7195"\w*.\f + \fr 23.13 \ft Treason: Heb. Conspiracy\f*

Then \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* brought \w out|strong="H3318"\w* the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w* that were set \w over|strong="H6485"\w* the \w host|strong="H2428"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Have her \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w ranges|strong="H1004"\w*: and whoso \w followeth|strong="H0935"\w* her, let him be \w slain|strong="H4191"\w* with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*. For the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Slay|strong="H4191"\w* her not in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

So they \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* on her; and when she was \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w entering|strong="H3996"\w* of the \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* by the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, they \w slew|strong="H4191"\w* her there.

¶ And \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* between him, and between all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and between the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, that they should be the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

Then all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, and brake it \w down|strong="H5422"\w*, and \w brake|strong="H7665"\w* his \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* and his \w images|strong="H6754"\w* in \w pieces|strong="H7665"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* \w Mattan|strong="H4977"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* of \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*.

Also \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* \w appointed|strong="H7760"\w* the \w offices|strong="H6486"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, whom \w David|strong="H1732"\w* had \w distributed|strong="H2505"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, to \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* the burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, as \add it is\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, with \w rejoicing|strong="H8057"\w* and with \w singing|strong="H7892"\w*, \add as it was ordained\add* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.  +  r 23.18  t as it was…: Heb. by the hands of David *

And he \w set|strong="H5975"\w* the \w porters|strong="H7778"\w* at the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that none \add which was\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* in any \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* should enter \w in|strong="H0935"\w*.

And he \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w*, and the \w nobles|strong="H0117"\w*, and the \w governors|strong="H4910"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and brought \w down|strong="H3381"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* from the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w through|strong="H8432"\w* the \w high|strong="H5945"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* into the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w set|strong="H3427"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* upon the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of the \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w*.

And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w rejoiced|strong="H8055"\w*: and the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* was \w quiet|strong="H8252"\w*, after that they had \w slain|strong="H4191"\w* \w Athaliah|strong="H6271"\w* with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.
